thread.title: U.S. Cellular to Offer iPhone 6s & iPhone 6s Plus on Friday, Sept. 25
thread.title_full: U.S. Cellular to Offer iPhone 6s & iPhone 6s Plus on Friday, Sept. 25

title: U.S. Cellular to Offer iPhone 6s & iPhone 6s Plus on Friday, Sept. 25
text:
U.S. Cellular to Offer iPhone 6s & iPhone 6s Plus on Friday, Sept. 25 September 11, 2015 08:29 AM Eastern Daylight Time 
CHICAGO--( BUSINESS WIRE )--U.S. Cellular today announced it will offer iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus, the most advanced iPhones ever, beginning on Friday, September 25. Customers can pre-order iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus beginning on Saturday, September 12 at www.uscellular.com . 
iPhone 6s 16GB will be available starting at $32.45 per month for 20 months with U.S. Cellular’s installment pricing. iPhone 6s Plus 16GB will be available starting at $37.45 per month for 20 months with the company’s installment pricing. With two-year agreements, iPhone 6s 16GB will be available starting at $199, and iPhone 6s Plus 16GB will be available starting at $299. iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus and iPhone 5s will also be available. For additional pricing details, please visit www.uscellular.com . 
iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus bring a powerful new dimension to iPhone’s revolutionary Multi-Touch interface with 3D Touch, which senses how deeply you press the display, letting you do all kinds of essential things more quickly and simply. The new iPhones introduce Live Photos, which bring still images to life, transforming instants frozen in time into unforgettable living memories. Live Photos, 3D Touch, 12-megapixel iSight camera, 5-megapixel FaceTime HD camera with Retina Flash and more are powered by the Apple-designed A9 chip, the most advanced chip ever in a smartphone, delivering faster performance and great battery life. iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus are designed from the strongest glass on any smartphone and 7000 series aluminum the same alloy used in the aerospace industry, in gorgeous metallic finishes that now include rose gold. 
U.S. Cellular iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus customers can connect to a high-quality 4G LTE network with national coverage that delivers ultra-fast data speeds in big and small cities and rural communities, ensuring you’ll get the most out of your iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus. 
“We can’t wait for our customers to get their hands on the innovative iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus to see how these state-of-the-art smartphones will enhance their lives,” said Joe Settimi, vice president of marketing, U.S. Cellular. “At U.S. Cellular, we are committed to providing the best wireless experience by offering a high-quality network with national coverage that works where other networks don’t, along with value-packed plans and cutting-edge devices to keep you connected." 
Customers can buy iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus at U.S. Cellular retail shops and online at www.uscellular.com . For complete details on pricing, please visit www.uscellular.com . For more information on iPhone, please visit: www.apple.com/iphone . 
New Equipment Installment Contract, Shared Connect Plan and credit approval required. Customer pays tax at point of sale. Financing terms are zero down, zero APR; 20 monthly payments. Additional terms, conditions and/or charges may apply. See uscellular.com for details. 4G LTE not available in all areas. See uscellular.com/4G for detailed coverage info. 4G LTE service is provided in partnership with King Street Wireless. LTE is a trademark of ETSI. 
About U.S. Cellular 
U.S. Cellular is the fifth-largest full-service wireless carrier in the United States, providing national network coverage and industry-leading innovations designed to elevate the customer experience. The Chicago-based carrier has a strong line-up of cutting-edge devices that are all backed by a high-quality network in big and small cities and rural communities. Currently, 94 percent of customers have access to 4G LTE speeds, and 98 percent will have access by the end of 2015. U.S. Cellular was named a J.D. Power and Associates Customer Champion in 2014 for the third time in four years. To learn more about U.S. Cellular, visit one of its retail stores or uscellular.com. To get the latest news, promos and videos, connect with U.S. Cellular on Facebook.com/uscellular , Twitter.com/uscellular and YouTube.com/uscellularcorp . Contacts
